           issue<h3 class="medium-heading"><!----> issue</h3>
          
            Target project:<label for="targetProjectInput">Target project:</label>
            
              <input id="targetProjectInput" aria-owns="chops-autocomplete-1" aria-autocomplete="both" aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="listbox" aria-activedescendant="">
              
      
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }

        </table>

    <!----></mr-autocomplete>
            </div>
          </div>

      <style>
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {

          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;

  :host {
    --mr-edit-field-padding: 0.125em 4px;
    --mr-edit-field-width: 90%;

    font-family: var(--chops-font-family);

    font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
  }
  /** Converts a <button> to look like an <a> tag. */
  .linkify {
    display: inline;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
    border: 0;
    background: 0;
    cursor: pointer;
  }
  h1, h2, h3, h4 {
    background: none;
  }
  a, chops-button, a.button, .button, .linkify {
    color: var(--chops-link-color);
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: var(--chops-link-font-weight);
    font-family: var(--chops-font-family);
  }
  a:hover, .linkify:hover {
    text-decoration: underline;
  }
  a.button, .button {
    /* Links that look like buttons. */
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    text-decoration: none;
    transition: filter 0.3s ease-in-out, box-shadow 0.3s ease-in-out;
  }
  a.button:hover, .button:hover {
    filter: brightness(95%);
  }
  chops-button, a.button, .button {
    box-sizing: border-box;
    font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
    background: var(--chops-white);
    border-radius: 6px;
    --chops-button-padding: 0.25em 8px;
    margin: 0;
    margin-left: auto;
  }
  a.button, .button {
    padding: var(--chops-button-padding);
  }
  chops-button i.material-icons, a.button i.material-icons, .button i.material-icons {
    display: block;
    margin-right: 4px;
  }
  chops-button.emphasized, a.button.emphasized, .button.emphasized {
    background: var(--chops-primary-button-bg);
    color: var(--chops-primary-button-color);
    text-shadow: 1px 1px 3px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.25);
  }
  textarea, select, input {
    box-sizing: border-box;
    font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
  }
  /* Note: decoupling heading levels from styles is useful for
  * accessibility because styles will not always line up with semantically
  * appropriate heading levels.
  */
  .medium-heading {
    font-size: var(--chops-large-font-size);
    font-weight: normal;
    line-height: 1;

    color: var(--chops-link-color);
    margin: 0;
    margin-top: 0.25em;
    border-bottom: var(--chops-normal-border);

    line-height: 1.6;
  }

    padding: 0.5em 0;
    display: grid;
    max-width: 100%;

    align-items: flex-start;
  }

    font-weight: bold;
    text-align: right;

  }

      text-align: left;
    }

      grid-gap: var(--mr-input-grid-gap);
      grid-template-columns: 100%;
    }
  }

        mr-app {
          display: block;
          padding-top: var(--monorail-header-height);
          margin-top: -1px; /* Prevent a double border from showing up. */

          /* From shared-styles.js. */

          background: var(--chops-orange-50);
          color: var(--chops-field-error-color);
          display: block;
          font-weight: bold;
          text-align: center;
        }
      <style>
        
  :host {
    --mr-edit-field-padding: 0.125em 4px;
    --mr-edit-field-width: 90%;
    --mr-input-grid-gap: 6px;
    font-family: var(--chops-font-family);

    font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
  }
  /** Converts a <button> to look like an <a> tag. */
  .linkify {
    display: inline;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
    border: 0;
    background: 0;
    cursor: pointer;
  }
  h1, h2, h3, h4 {
    background: none;
  }
  a, chops-button, a.button, .button, .linkify {
    color: var(--chops-link-color);
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: var(--chops-link-font-weight);
    font-family: var(--chops-font-family);
  }
  a:hover, .linkify:hover {
    text-decoration: underline;
  }
  a.button, .button {
    /* Links that look like buttons. */
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    text-decoration: none;
    transition: filter 0.3s ease-in-out, box-shadow 0.3s ease-in-out;
  }
  a.button:hover, .button:hover {
    filter: brightness(95%);
  }
  chops-button, a.button, .button {
    box-sizing: border-box;
    font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
    background: var(--chops-white);
    border-radius: 6px;
    --chops-button-padding: 0.25em 8px;
    margin: 0;
    margin-left: auto;
  }
  a.button, .button {
    padding: var(--chops-button-padding);
  }
  chops-button i.material-icons, a.button i.material-icons, .button i.material-icons {
    display: block;
    margin-right: 4px;
  }
  chops-button.emphasized, a.button.emphasized, .button.emphasized {
    background: var(--chops-primary-button-bg);
    color: var(--chops-primary-button-color);
    text-shadow: 1px 1px 3px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.25);
  }
  textarea, select, input {
    box-sizing: border-box;
    font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
  }
  /* Note: decoupling heading levels from styles is useful for
  * accessibility because styles will not always line up with semantically
  * appropriate heading levels.
  */
  .medium-heading {
    font-size: var(--chops-large-font-size);
    font-weight: normal;
    line-height: 1;
    padding: 0.25em 0;
    color: var(--chops-link-color);
    margin: 0;
    margin-top: 0.25em;
    border-bottom: var(--chops-normal-border);
  }
  .medium-heading chops-button {
    line-height: 1.6;
  }
  .input-grid {
    padding: 0.5em 0;
    display: grid;
    max-width: 100%;
    grid-gap: var(--mr-input-grid-gap);
    grid-template-columns: minmax(120px, max-content) 1fr;
    align-items: flex-start;
  }
  .input-grid label {
    font-weight: bold;
    text-align: right;
    word-wrap: break-word;
  }
  @media (max-width: 600px) {
    .input-grid label {
      margin-top: var(--mr-input-grid-gap);
      text-align: left;
    }
    .input-grid {
      grid-gap: var(--mr-input-grid-gap);
      grid-template-columns: 100%;
    }
  }

        mr-app {
          display: block;
          padding-top: var(--monorail-header-height);
          margin-top: -1px; /* Prevent a double border from showing up. */

          /* From shared-styles.js. */
          --mr-edit-field-padding: 0.125em 4px;
          --mr-edit-field-width: 90%;
          --mr-input-grid-gap: 6px;
          font-family: var(--chops-font-family);
          color: var(--chops-primary-font-color);
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
        }
        main {
          border-top: var(--chops-normal-border);
        }
        .snackbar-container {
          position: fixed;
          bottom: 1em;
          left: 1em;
          display: flex;
          flex-direction: column;
          align-items: flex-start;
          z-index: 1000;
        }
        /** Unfix <chops-snackbar> to allow stacking. */
        chops-snackbar {
          position: static;
          margin-top: 0.5em;
        }
        .project-alert {
          background: var(--chops-orange-50);
          color: var(--chops-field-error-color);
          display: block;
          font-weight: bold;
          text-align: center;
        }
      </style>

          only project members can select issues for bulk edits.

            </div>
          <!---->
        </div>
        <p>
          Note: Only signed in users can star issues or add comments, and
          only project members can select issues for bulk edits.
        </p>
      </chops-dialog>
    <mr-keystrokes></mr-keystrokes>

    <mr-cue centered="" cueprefname="search_for_numbers" hidden=""></mr-cue>


          
      
        mr-issue-page {
          --mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding: 12px;
          --mr-toggled-font-family: inherit;
          --monorail-metadata-toggled-bg: var(--monorail-metadata-open-bg);
        }
        mr-issue-page[issueClosed] {
          --monorail-metadata-toggled-bg: var(--monorail-metadata-closed-bg);
        }
        mr-issue-page[codeFont] {
          --mr-toggled-font-family: Monospace;
        }
        .container-issue {
          width: 100%;
          flex-direction: column;
          align-items: stretch;
          justify-content: flex-start;
          z-index: 200;
        }
        .container-issue-content {
          padding: 0;
          flex-grow: 1;
          display: flex;
          align-items: stretch;
          justify-content: space-between;
          flex-direction: row;
          flex-wrap: nowrap;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          padding-top: 0.5em;
        }
        .container-outside {
          box-sizing: border-box;
          width: 100%;
          max-width: 100%;
          margin: auto;
          padding: 0;
          display: flex;
          align-items: stretch;
          justify-content: space-between;
          flex-direction: row;
          flex-wrap: no-wrap;
        }
        .container-no-issue {
          padding: 0.5em 16px;
          font-size: var(--chops-large-font-size);
        }
        .metadata-container {
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          background: var(--monorail-metadata-toggled-bg);
          border-right: var(--chops-normal-border);
          border-bottom: var(--chops-normal-border);
          width: 24em;
          min-width: 256px;
          flex-grow: 0;
          flex-shrink: 0;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          z-index: 100;
        }
        .issue-header-container {
          z-index: 10;
          position: sticky;
          top: var(--monorail-header-height);
          margin-bottom: 0.25em;
          width: 100%;
        }
        mr-issue-details {
          min-width: 50%;
          max-width: 1000px;
          flex-grow: 1;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          min-height: 100%;
          padding-left: var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          padding-right: var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
        }
        mr-issue-metadata {
          position: sticky;
          overflow-y: auto;
          top: var(--monorail-header-height);
          height: calc(100vh - var(--monorail-header-height));
        }
        mr-launch-overview {
          border-left: var(--chops-normal-border);
          padding-left: var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          padding-right: var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          flex-grow: 0;
          flex-shrink: 0;
          width: 50%;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          min-height: 100%;
        }
        @media (max-width: 1126px) {
          .container-issue-content {
            flex-direction: column;
            padding: 0 var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          }
          mr-issue-details, mr-launch-overview {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 0;
            border: 0;
          }
        }
        @media (max-width: 840px) {
          .container-outside {
            flex-direction: column;
          }
          .metadata-container {
            width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border: 0;
            border-bottom: var(--chops-normal-border);
          }
          mr-issue-metadata {
            min-width: auto;
            max-width: auto;
            width: 100%;
            padding: 0;
            min-height: 0;
            border: 0;
          }
          mr-issue-metadata, .issue-header-container {
            position: static;
          }
        }

        Email display settings<h2>Email display settings</h2>

        There is a setting<a href="/hosting/settings">setting</a> to control how
        your email address appears on comments and issues that you post.<p>There is a <a href="/hosting/settings">setting</a> to control how
        your email address appears on comments and issues that you post.</p>

        Project members will always see your full email address.  By
        default, other users who visit the site will see an
        abbreviated version of your email address.<p>Project members will always see your full email address.  By
        default, other users who visit the site will see an
        abbreviated version of your email address.</p>

        If you do not wish your email address to be shared, there
        are other ways to get
        involved<a href="http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved">get
        involved</a> in the community.  To report a problem when using
        the Chrome browser, you may use the "Report an issue..."  item
        on the "Help" menu.<p>If you do not wish your email address to be shared, there
        are other ways to <a href="http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved">get
        involved</a> in the community.  To report a problem when using
        the Chrome browser, you may use the "Report an issue..."  item
        on the "Help" menu.</p>


        
          
      
        <slot></slot>
      <button>
        <slot></slot>
      </button>
    
            Got it
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>
      <chops-dialog id="privacyDialog" forced="">
        <h2>Email display settings</h2>

        <p>There is a <a href="/hosting/settings">setting</a> to control how
        your email address appears on comments and issues that you post.</p>

        <p>Project members will always see your full email address.  By
        default, other users who visit the site will see an
        abbreviated version of your email address.</p>

        <p>If you do not wish your email address to be shared, there
        are other ways to <a href="http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved">get
        involved</a> in the community.  To report a problem when using
        the Chrome browser, you may use the "Report an issue..."  item
        on the "Help" menu.</p>


        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>
      </chops-dialog>

        <div class="dialog-content">
          <slot></slot>
        </div>

        <div class="dialog-content">
          <slot></slot>
        </div>
      </dialog>
    
        This site hosts public issues in public projects<h2>This site hosts public issues in public projects</h2>

        Unlike our internal issue tracker, this site makes most
        issues public, unless the issue is labeled with a Restrict-View-*
        label, such as Restrict-View-Google.<p>Unlike our internal issue tracker, this site makes most
        issues public, unless the issue is labeled with a Restrict-View-*
        label, such as Restrict-View-Google.</p>

        Components are not used for permissions.  And, regardless of
        restriction labels, the issue reporter, owner,
        and Cc'd users may always view the issue.<p>Components are not used for permissions.  And, regardless of
        restriction labels, the issue reporter, owner,
        and Cc'd users may always view the issue.</p>

        

        
          
      
        <slot></slot>
      <button>
        <slot></slot>
      </button>

          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>
      <chops-dialog id="corpModeDialog" forced="">
        <h2>This site hosts public issues in public projects</h2>

        <p>Unlike our internal issue tracker, this site makes most
        issues public, unless the issue is labeled with a Restrict-View-*
        label, such as Restrict-View-Google.</p>

        <p>Components are not used for permissions.  And, regardless of
        restriction labels, the issue reporter, owner,
        and Cc'd users may always view the issue.</p>

class="line"><!---->ui/views/widget/native_widget_aura.cc<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>NativeWidgetAura::NativeWidgetAura(internal::NativeWidgetDelegate* this);<span class="line"><!---->  wm::SetActivationChangeObserver(window_, this);<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br><br>void NativeWidgetAura::CloseNow() {<span class="line"><!---->void NativeWidgetAura::CloseNow() {<!----></span><br>  delete window_; ---- [3]<span class="line"><!---->  delete window_; ---- [3]<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>ash/capture_mode/capture_mode_controller.cc<span class="line"><!---->ash/capture_mode/capture_mode_controller.cc<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>void CaptureModeController::CaptureImage(const CaptureParams& capture_params,<span class="line"><!---->void CaptureModeController::CaptureImage(const CaptureParams&amp; capture_params,<!----></span><br>                                         const base::FilePath& path) {<span class="line"><!---->                                         const base::FilePath&amp; path) {<!----></span><br>  // Note that |type_| may not necessarily be |kImage| here, since this may be<span class="line"><!---->  // Note that |type_| may not necessarily be |kImage| here, since this may be<!----></span><br>  // called to take an instant fullscreen screenshot for the keyboard shortcut,<span class="line"><!---->  // called to take an instant fullscreen screenshot for the keyboard shortcut,<!----></span><br>  // which doesn't go through the capture mode UI, and doesn't change |type_|.<span class="line"><!---->  // which doesn't go through the capture mode UI, and doesn't change |type_|.<!----></span><br>  DCHECK(delegate_->IsCaptureAllowedByPolicy());<span class="line"><!---->  DCHECK(delegate_-&gt;IsCaptureAllowedByPolicy());<!----></span><br><br>  // Stop the capture session now, so as not to take a screenshot of the capture<span class="line"><!---->  // Stop the capture session now, so as not to take a screenshot of the capture<!----></span><br>  // bar.<span class="line"><!---->  // bar.<!----></span><br>  if (IsActive())<span class="line"><!---->  if (IsActive())<!----></span><br>    Stop(); ---- [2]<span class="line"><!---->    Stop(); ---- [2]<!----></span><br><br>  DCHECK(!capture_params.bounds.IsEmpty());<span class="line"><!---->  DCHECK(!capture_params.bounds.IsEmpty());<!----></span><br><br>  auto* cursor_manager = Shell::Get()->cursor_manager();<span class="line"><!---->  auto* cursor_manager = Shell::Get()-&gt;cursor_manager();<!----></span><br>  bool was_cursor_originally_blocked = cursor_manager->IsCursorLocked();<span class="line"><!---->  bool was_cursor_originally_blocked = cursor_manager-&gt;IsCursorLocked();<!----></span><br>  if (!was_cursor_originally_blocked) {<span class="line"><!---->  if (!was_cursor_originally_blocked) {<!----></span><br>    cursor_manager->HideCursor();<span class="line"><!---->    cursor_manager-&gt;HideCursor();<!----></span><br>    cursor_manager->LockCursor();<span class="line"><!---->    cursor_manager-&gt;LockCursor();<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br><br>  ui::GrabWindowSnapshotAsyncPNG( <span class="line"><!---->  ui::GrabWindowSnapshotAsyncPNG( <!----></span><br>      capture_params.window, capture_params.bounds, ---- [4]<span class="line"><!---->      capture_params.window, capture_params.bounds, ---- [4]<!----></span><br> class="line"><!---->                     was_cursor_originally_blocked));<!----></span><br><br>  ++num_screenshots_taken_in_last_day_;<span class="line"><!---->  ++num_screenshots_taken_in_last_day_;<!----></span><br>  ++num_screenshots_taken_in_last_week_;<span class="line"><!---->  ++num_screenshots_taken_in_last_week_;<!----></span><br><br>  ++num_consecutive_screenshots_;<span class="line"><!---->  ++num_consecutive_screenshots_;<!----></span><br>  num_consecutive_screenshots_scheduler_.Reset();<span class="line"><!---->  num_consecutive_screenshots_scheduler_.Reset();<!----></span><br><br>  capture_mode_util::TriggerAccessibilityAlert(<span class="line"><!---->  capture_mode_util::TriggerAccessibilityAlert(<!----></span><br>      IDS_ASH_SCREEN_CAPTURE_ALERT_SCREENSHOT_CAPTURED);<span class="line"><!---->      IDS_ASH_SCREEN_CAPTURE_ALERT_SCREENSHOT_CAPTURED);<!----></span><br><br>  delegate_->OnCaptureImageAttempted(capture_params.window,<span class="line"><!---->  delegate_-&gt;OnCaptureImageAttempted(capture_params.window,<!----></span><br>                                     capture_params.bounds);<span class="line"><!---->                                     capture_params.bounds);<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>1. If we make a new capture session, a new aura::Window is created in [1].<span class="line"><!---->1. If we make a new capture session, a new aura::Window is created in [1].<!----></span><br><br>2. When we capture a window, if there is an active capture session, stop the session. [2]<span class="line"><!---->2. When we capture a window, if there is an active capture session, stop the session. [2]<!----></span><br><br>3. At this time, the window that was created in [1] is freed at [3].<span class="line"><!---->3. At this time, the window that was created in [1] is freed at [3].<!----></span><br><br>4. If capture_params.window in [4] is the same window as the freed window, then UAF will occur.<span class="line"><!---->4. If capture_params.window in [4] is the same window as the freed window, then UAF will occur.<!----></span><br><br><br>* Patch suggestion<span class="line"><!---->* Patch suggestion<!----></span><br><br>Add a check between `capture_mode_bar_widget_->GetNativeWindow()` and `capture_params.window` before releasing the window or capturing the window.<span class="line"><!---->Add a check between `capture_mode_bar_widget_-&gt;GetNativeWindow()` and `capture_params.window` before releasing the window or capturing the window.<!----></span><br><br>VERSION<b class="line"><!---->VERSION<!----></b><br>Chrome Version: 107.0.5257.0 / latest commit <span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: 107.0.5257.0 / latest commit <!----></span>9eb4cb6adfdf06438e1d971140cb5dcd059387db<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/9eb4cb6adfdf06438e1d971140cb5dcd059387db"><!---->9eb4cb6adfdf06438e1d971140cb5dcd059387db<!----></a><br>Operating System: ChromeOS<span class="line"><!---->Operating System: ChromeOS<!----></span><br><br>REPRODUCTION CASE<b class="line"><!---->REPRODUCTION CASE<!----></b><br><br>When capturing a window, a slight delay is needed to select the capture mode bar window.<span class="line"><!---->When capturing a window, a slight delay is needed to select the capture mode bar window.<!----></span><br><br>So I make a delay by switching two tabs on the preferences page.<span class="line"><!---->So I make a delay by switching two tabs on the preferences page.<!----></span><br><br>And a right click is needed before capturing. (I am not sure why)<span class="line"><!---->And a right click is needed before capturing. (I am not sure why)<!----></span><br><br>In summary,<span class="line"><!---->In summary,<!----></span><br><br>1. Open the preferences page.<span class="line"><!---->1. Open the preferences page.<!----></span><br>2. Click wifi to change the preferences page.<span class="line"><!---->2. Click wifi to change the preferences page.<!----></span><br>3. Right-click somewhere and open the capture session during switching delay.<span class="line"><!---->3. Right-click somewhere and open the capture session during switching delay.<!----></span><br>4. Select the capture mode bar window.<span class="line"><!---->4. Select the capture mode bar window.<!----></span><br><br>I will also upload the PoC script.<span class="line"><!---->I will also upload the PoC script.<!----></span><br><br>Before executing the script, you should open the preferences page.<span class="line"><!---->Before executing the script, you should open the preferences page.<!----></span><br><br>FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<b class="line"><!---->FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<!----></b><br>Type of crash: chromeos<span class="line"><!---->Type of crash:         I don't think this can be repro'ed by a regular user (i.e. without the script you're using). When the capture bar is the target: <span class="line"><!---->I don't think this can be repro'ed by a regular user (i.e. without the script you're using). When the capture bar is the target: <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/capture_mode/capture_mode_session.cc;l=1967-1968?q=CaptureModeSession::OnLocatedEvent&ss=chromium<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/capture_mode/capture_mode_session.cc;l=1967-1968?q=CaptureModeSession::OnLocatedEvent&amp;ss=chromium"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/capture_mode/capture_mode_session.cc;l=1967-1968?q=CaptureModeSession::OnLocatedEvent&amp;ss=chromium<!----></a> we early exit, and don't even attempt to select a window to capture.<span class="line"><!----> we early exit, and don't even attempt to select a window to capture.<!----></span><br><br>However, I will add some code to ignore the capture bar widget from being selectable.<span class="line"><!---->However, I will add some code to ignore the capture bar widget from being selectable.<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

            Target project:<label for="targetProjectInput">Target project:</label>
            
              <input id="targetProjectInput" aria-owns="chops-autocomplete-1" aria-autocomplete="both" aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="listbox" aria-activedescendant="">
              
      
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }

          <h3 class="medium-heading"><!----> issue</h3>

            <label for="targetProjectInput">Target project:</label>
            <div>
              <input id="targetProjectInput" aria-owns="chops-autocomplete-1" aria-autocomplete="both" aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="listbox" aria-activedescendant="">
              <mr-autocomplete vocabularyname="project" for="targetProjectInput" role="listbox" id="chops-autocomplete-1"><!---->
      <style>
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }
      </style>
      <div class="chops-autocomplete-container">
        <span class="screenreader-hidden" aria-live="polite">
          
        </span>
        <table hidden="">
          <tbody>
            
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    <!----></mr-autocomplete>
            </div>
          </div>

      <style>
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {

          text-decoration: underline;

              Discard

              Convert issue

        }
        mr-launch-overview[hidden] {
          display: none;
        }
        mr-phase {
          margin-bottom: 0.75em;
        }
      </style>
      
      
    <!----></mr-launch-overview>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        Email display settings<h2>Email display settings</h2>

        There is a setting<a href="/hosting/settings">setting</a> to control how
        your email address appears on comments and issues that you post.<p>There is a <a href="/hosting/settings">setting</a> to control how
        your email address appears on comments and issues that you post.</p>

        Project members will always see your full email address.  By
        default, other users who visit the site will see an
        abbreviated version of your email address.<p>Project members will always see your full email address.  By
        default, other users who visit the site will see an
        abbreviated version of your email address.</p>

        If you do not wish your email address to be shared, there
        are other ways to get
        involved<a href="http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved">get
        involved</a> in the community.  To report a problem when using
        the Chrome browser, you may use the "Report an issue..."  item
        on the "Help" menu.<p>If you do not wish your email address to be shared, there
        are other ways to <a href="http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved">get
        involved</a> in the community.  To report a problem when using
        the Chrome browser, you may use the "Report an issue..."  item
        on the "Help" menu.</p>


        
          
      
        <slot></slot>
      <button>
        <slot></slot>
      </button>
    
            Got it
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>
      <chops-dialog id="privacyDialog" forced="">
        <h2>Email display settings</h2>

        <p>There is a <a href="/hosting/settings">setting</a> to control how
        your email address appears on comments and issues that you post.</p>

        <p>Project members will always see your full email address.  By
        default, other users who visit the site will see an
        abbreviated version of your email address.</p>

        <p>If you do not wish your email address to be shared, there
        are other ways to <a href="http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved">get
        involved</a> in the community.  To report a problem when using
        the Chrome browser, you may use the "Report an issue..."  item
        on the "Help" menu.</p>


        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>
      </chops-dialog>

      
      
        
          <slot></slot>
        <div class="dialog-content">
          <slot></slot>
        </div>
      <dialog class="dialog" role="dialog">
        <div class="dialog-content">
          <slot></slot>
        </div>
      </dialog>
    
        This site hosts public issues in public projects<h2>This site hosts public issues in public projects</h2>

        Unlike our internal issue tracker, this site makes most
        issues public, unless the issue is labeled with a Restrict-View-*
        label, such as Restrict-View-Google.<p>Unlike our internal issue tracker, this site makes most
        issues public, unless the issue is labeled with a Restrict-View-*
        label, such as Restrict-View-Google.</p>

        Components are not used for permissions.  And, regardless of
        restriction labels, the issue reporter, owner,
        and Cc'd users may always view the issue.<p>Components are not used for permissions.  And, regardless of
        restriction labels, the issue reporter, owner,
        and Cc'd users may always view the issue.</p>

        

        
          
      
        <slot></slot>
      <button>
        <slot></slot>
      </button>
    
            Got it
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>
      <chops-dialog id="corpModeDialog" forced="">
        <h2>This site hosts public issues in public projects</h2>

        <p>Unlike our internal issue tracker, this site makes most
        issues public, unless the issue is labeled with a Restrict-View-*
        label, such as Restrict-View-Google.</p>

        <p>Components are not used for permissions.  And, regardless of
        restriction labels, the issue reporter, owner,
        and Cc'd users may always view the issue.</p>

          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>

      VULNERABILITY DETAILS<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b><br><br>ui/views/widget/native_widget_aura.cc<span class="line"><!---->ui/views/widget/native_widget_aura.cc<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>NativeWidgetAura::NativeWidgetAura(internal::NativeWidgetDelegate* delegate)<span class="line"><!---->NativeWidgetAura::NativeWidgetAura(internal::NativeWidgetDelegate* delegate)<!----></span><br>    : delegate_(delegate),<span class="line"><!---->    : delegate_(delegate),<!----></span><br>      window_(new aura::Window(this, aura::client::WINDOW_TYPE_UNKNOWN)), ---- [1]<span class="line"><!---->      window_(new aura::Window(this,         I don't think this can be repro'ed by a regular user (i.e. without the script you're using). When the capture bar is the target: <span class="line"><!---->I don't think this can be repro'ed by a regular user (i.e. without the script you're using). When the capture bar is the target: <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/capture_mode/capture_mode_session.cc;l=1967-1968?q=CaptureModeSession::OnLocatedEvent&ss=chromium<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/capture_mode/capture_mode_session.cc;l=1967-1968?q=CaptureModeSession::OnLocatedEvent&amp;ss=chromium"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/capture_mode/capture_mode_session.cc;l=1967-1968?q=CaptureModeSession::OnLocatedEvent&amp;ss=chromium<!----></a> we early exit, and don't even attempt to select a window to capture.<span class="line"><!----> we early exit, and don't even attempt to select a window to capture.<!----></span><br><br>However, I will add some code to ignore the capture bar widget from being selectable.<span class="line"><!---->However, I will add some code to ignore the capture bar widget from being selectable.<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

up as the selected window to be<!----></span><br>captured.<span class="line"><!---->captured.<!----></span><br><br>This CL adds code to guard against this.<span class="line"><!---->This CL adds code to guard against this.<!----></span><br><br>Fixed: 1355752<a class="strike-through" target="_blank" href="/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1355752" title="Security: heap-use-after-free in         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

           issue<h3 class="medium-heading"><!----> issue</h3>
          
            Target project:<label for="targetProjectInput">Target project:</label>
            
              <input id="targetProjectInput" aria-owns="chops-autocomplete-1" aria-autocomplete="both" aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="listbox" aria-activedescendant="">
              
      
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }
      <style>
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;

      </style>

        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.

          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;

           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }

          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;

            <i class="material-icons">close</i>
          </button>

          <span>Blocked on issues</span>

          </button>

      <chops-dialog closeonoutsideclick="">

          </button>

        Email display settings<h2>Email display settings</h2>

        There is a setting<a href="/hosting/settings">setting</a> to control how
        your email address appears on comments and issues that you post.<p>There is a <a href="/hosting/settings">setting</a> to control how
        your email address appears on comments and issues that you post.</p>

        Project members will always see your full email address.  By
        default, other users who visit the site will see an
        abbreviated version of your email address.<p>Project members will always see your full email address.  By
        default, other users who visit the site will see an
        abbreviated version of your email address.</p>

        If you do not wish your email address to be shared, there
        are other ways to get
        involved<a href="http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved">get
        involved</a> in the community.  To report a problem when using
        the Chrome browser, you may use the "Report an issue..."  item
        on the "Help" menu.<p>If you do not wish your email address to be shared, there
        are other ways to <a href="http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved">get
        involved</a> in the community.  To report a problem when using
        the Chrome browser, you may use the "Report an issue..."  item
        on the "Help" menu.</p>


        
          
      
        <slot></slot>
      <button>
        <slot></slot>
      </button>
    
            Got it
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>
      <chops-dialog id="privacyDialog" forced="">
        <h2>Email display settings</h2>

        <p>There is a <a href="/hosting/settings">setting</a> to control how
        your email address appears on comments and issues that you post.</p>

        <p>Project members will always see your full email address.  By
        default, other users who visit the site will see an
        abbreviated version of your email address.</p>

        <p>If you do not wish your email address to be shared, there
        are other ways to <a href="http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved">get
        involved</a> in the community.  To report a problem when using
        the Chrome browser, you may use the "Report an issue..."  item
        on the "Help" menu.</p>


        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>
      </chops-dialog>

      
      
        
          <slot></slot>
        <div class="dialog-content">
          <slot></slot>
        </div>
      <dialog class="dialog" role="dialog">
        <div class="dialog-content">
          <slot></slot>
        </div>
      </dialog>
    
        This site hosts public issues in public projects<h2>This site hosts public issues in public projects</h2>

        Unlike our internal issue tracker, this site makes most
        issues public, unless the issue is labeled with a Restrict-View-*
        label, such as Restrict-View-Google.<p>Unlike our internal issue tracker, this site makes most
        issues public, unless the issue is labeled with a Restrict-View-*
        label, such as Restrict-View-Google.</p>

        Components are not used for permissions.  And, regardless of
        restriction labels, the issue reporter, owner,
        and Cc'd users may always view the issue.<p>Components are not used for permissions.  And, regardless of
        restriction labels, the issue reporter, owner,
        and Cc'd users may always view the issue.</p>

        

        
          
      
        <slot></slot>
      <button>
        <slot></slot>
      </button>
    
            Got it
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>
      <chops-dialog id="corpModeDialog" forced="">
        <h2>This site hosts public issues in public projects</h2>

        <p>Unlike our internal issue tracker, this site makes most
        issues public, unless the issue is labeled with a Restrict-View-*
        label, such as Restrict-View-Google.</p>

        <p>Components are not used for permissions.  And, regardless of
        restriction labels, the issue reporter, owner,
        and Cc'd users may always view the issue.</p>

        

        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>
      </chops-dialog>

        I don't think this can be repro'ed by a regular user (i.e. without the script you're using). When the capture bar is the target: <span class="line"><!---->I don't think this can be repro'ed by a regular user (i.e. without the script you're using). When the capture bar is the target: <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/capture_mode/capture_mode_session.cc;l=1967-1968?q=CaptureModeSession::OnLocatedEvent&ss=chromium<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/capture_mode/capture_mode_session.cc;l=1967-1968?q=CaptureModeSession::OnLocatedEvent&amp;ss=chromium"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/capture_mode/capture_mode_session.cc;l=1967-1968?q=CaptureModeSession::OnLocatedEvent&amp;ss=chromium<!----></a> we early exit, and don't even attempt to select a window to capture.<span class="line"><!----> we early exit, and don't even attempt to select a window to capture.<!----></span><br><br>However, I will add some code to ignore the capture bar widget from being selectable.<span class="line"><!---->However, I will add some code to ignore the capture bar widget from being selectable.<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        </div>

        *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>
        
          
        <div>
          
        </div>
      <div class="comment-body">
        <mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>
        <div>
          
        </div>
      </div>

      VULNERABILITY DETAILS<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b><br><br>ui/views/widget/native_widget_aura.cc<span class="line"><!---->ui/views/widget/native_widget_aura.cc<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>NativeWidgetAura::NativeWidgetAura(internal::NativeWidgetDelegate* delegate)<span class="line"><!---->NativeWidgetAura::NativeWidgetAura(internal::NativeWidgetDelegate* delegate)<!----></span><br>    : delegate_(delegate),<span class="line"><!---->    : delegate_(delegate),<!----></span><br>      window_(new aura::Window(this, aura::client::WINDOW_TYPE_UNKNOWN)), ---- [1]<span class="line"><!---->      window_(new aura::Window(this, aura::client::WINDOW_TYPE_UNKNOWN)), ---- [1]<!----></span><br>      ownership_(Widget::InitParams::NATIVE_WIDGET_OWNS_WIDGET),<span class="line"><!---->      ownership_(Widget::InitParams::NATIVE_WIDGET_OWNS_WIDGET),<!----></span><br>      destroying_(false) {<span class="line"><!---->      destroying_(false) {<!----></span><br> this);<span class="line"><!---->  wm::SetActivationChangeObserver(window_, this);<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br><br>void NativeWidgetAura::CloseNow() {<span class="line"><!---->void NativeWidgetAura::CloseNow() {<!----></span><br>  delete window_; ---- [3]<span class="line"><!---->  delete window_; ---- [3]<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>ash/capture_mode/capture_mode_controller.cc<span class="line"><!---->ash/capture_mode/capture_mode_controller.cc<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>void CaptureModeController::CaptureImage(const CaptureParams& capture_params,<span class="line"><!---->void CaptureModeController::CaptureImage(const CaptureParams&amp; capture_params,<!----></span><br>                                         const base::FilePath& path) {<span class="line"><!---->                                         const base::FilePath&amp; path) {<!----></span><br>  // Note that |type_| may not necessarily be |kImage| here, since this may be<span class="line"><!---->  // Note that |type_| may not necessarily be |kImage| here, since this may be<!----></span><br>  // called to take an instant fullscreen screenshot for the keyboard shortcut,<span class="line"><!---->  // called to take an instant fullscreen screenshot for the keyboard shortcut,<!----></span><br>  // which doesn't go through the capture mode UI, and doesn't change |type_|.<span class="line"><!---->  // which doesn't go through the capture mode UI, and doesn't change |type_|.<!----></span><br>  DCHECK(delegate_->IsCaptureAllowedByPolicy());<span class="line"><!---->  DCHECK(delegate_-&gt;IsCaptureAllowedByPolicy());<!----></span><br><br>  // Stop the capture session now, so as not to take a screenshot of the capture<span class="line"><!---->  // Stop the capture session now, so as not to take a screenshot of the capture<!----></span><br>  // bar.<span class="line"><!---->  // bar.<!----></span><br>  if (IsActive())<span class="line"><!---->  if (IsActive())<!----></span><br>    Stop(); ---- [2]<span class="line"><!---->    Stop(); ---- [2]<!----></span><br><br>  DCHECK(!capture_params.bounds.IsEmpty());<span class="line"><!---->  DCHECK(!capture_params.bounds.IsEmpty());<!----></span><br><br>  auto* cursor_manager = Shell::Get()->cursor_manager();<span         I don't think this can be repro'ed by a regular user (i.e. without the script you're using). When the capture bar is the target: <span class="line"><!---->I don't think this can be repro'ed by a regular user (i.e. without the script you're using). When the capture bar is the target: <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/capture_mode/capture_mode_session.cc;l=1967-1968?q=CaptureModeSession::OnLocatedEvent&ss=chromium<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/capture_mode/capture_mode_session.cc;l=1967-1968?q=CaptureModeSession::OnLocatedEvent&amp;ss=chromium"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/capture_mode/capture_mode_session.cc;l=1967-1968?q=CaptureModeSession::OnLocatedEvent&amp;ss=chromium<!----></a> we early exit, and don't even attempt to select a window to capture.<span class="line"><!----> we early exit, and don't even attempt to select a window to capture.<!----></span><br><br>However, I will add some code to ignore the capture bar widget from being selectable.<span class="line"><!---->However, I will add some code to ignore the capture bar widget from being selectable.<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);

        by
        <mr-user-link></mr-user-link>

        I don't think this can be repro'ed by a regular user (i.e. without the script you're using). When the capture bar is the target: <span class="line"><!---->I don't think this can be repro'ed by a regular user (i.e. without the script you're using). When the capture bar is the target: <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/capture_mode/capture_mode_session.cc;l=1967-1968?q=CaptureModeSession::OnLocatedEvent&ss=chromium<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/capture_mode/capture_mode_session.cc;l=1967-1968?q=CaptureModeSession::OnLocatedEvent&amp;ss=chromium"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/capture_mode/capture_mode_session.cc;l=1967-1968?q=CaptureModeSession::OnLocatedEvent&amp;ss=chromium<!----></a> we early exit, and don't even attempt to select a window to capture.<span class="line"><!----> we early exit, and don't even attempt to select a window to capture.<!----></span><br><br>However, I will add some code to ignore the capture bar widget from being selectable.<span class="line"><!---->However, I will add some code to ignore the capture bar widget from being selectable.<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>
        
          
        <div>
          
        </div>
      <div class="comment-body">
        <mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>
        <div>
          
        </div>
      </div>

capture_params.bounds);<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>1. If we make a new capture session, a new aura::Window is created in [1].<span class="line"><!---->1. If we make a new capture session, a new aura::Window is created in [1].<!----></span><br><br>2. When we capture a window, if there is an active capture session, stop the session. [2]<span class="line"><!---->2. When we capture a window, if there is an active capture session, stop the session. [2]<!----></span><br><br>3. At this time, the window that was created in [1] is freed at [3].<span class="line"><!---->3. At this time, the window that was created in [1] is freed at [3].<!----></span><br><br>4. If capture_params.window in [4] is the same window as the freed window, then UAF will occur.<span class="line"><!---->4.         I don't think this can be repro'ed by a regular user (i.e. without the script you're using). When the capture bar is the target: <span class="line"><!---->I don't think this can be repro'ed by a regular user (i.e. without the script you're using). When the capture bar is the target: <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/capture_mode/capture_mode_session.cc;l=1967-1968?q=CaptureModeSession::OnLocatedEvent&ss=chromium<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/capture_mode/capture_mode_session.cc;l=1967-1968?q=CaptureModeSession::OnLocatedEvent&amp;ss=chromium"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/capture_mode/capture_mode_session.cc;l=1967-1968?q=CaptureModeSession::OnLocatedEvent&amp;ss=chromium<!----></a> we early exit, and don't even attempt to select a window to capture.<span class="line"><!----> we early exit, and don't even attempt to select a window to capture.<!----></span><br><br>However, I will add some code to ignore the capture bar widget from being selectable.<span class="line"><!---->However, I will add some code to ignore the capture bar widget from being selectable.<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

   f3<span class="line"><!---->  Stack right redzone:     f3<!----></span><br>  Stack after return:      f5<span class="line"><!---->  Stack after return:      f5<!----></span><br>  Stack use after scope:   f8<span class="line"><!---->  Stack use after scope:   f8<!----></span><br>  Global redzone:          f9<span class="line"><!---->  Global redzone:          f9<!----></span><br>  Global init order:       f6<span class="line"><!---->  Global init order:       f6<!----></span><br>  Poisoned by user:        f7<span class="line"><!---->  Poisoned by user:        f7<!----></span><br>  Container overflow:      fc<span class="line"><!---->  Container overflow:      fc<!----></span><br>  Array cookie:            ac<span class="line"><!---->  Array cookie:            ac<!----></span><br>  Intra object redzone:    bb<span class="line"><!---->  Intra object redzone:    bb<!----></span><br>  ASan internal:           fe<span class="line"><!---->  ASan internal:           fe<!----></span><br>  Left alloca redzone:     ca<span class="line"><!---->  Left alloca redzone:     ca<!----></span><br>  Right alloca redzone:    cb<span class="line"><!---->  Right alloca redzone:    cb<!----></span><br>==380509==ABORTING<span class="line"><!---->==380509==ABORTING<!----></span><br><br>CREDIT INFORMATION<b class="line"><!---->CREDIT INFORMATION<!----></b><br>Reporter credit: YoungJoo Lee(@ashuu_lee) of CompSec Lab at Seoul National University<span class="line"><!---->Reporter credit: YoungJoo Lee(@ashuu_lee) of CompSec Lab at Seoul National           Comment 7<a class="comment-link" href="?id=1355752#c7">Comment 7<!----></a>

          
        by
        
      <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/icon?family=Material+Icons" rel="stylesheet">
      schedule<i id="availability-icon" class="material-icons inline-icon ${user.last_visit_timestamp ? '': 'inline-icon-unseen'}" title="undefined" hidden="">schedule</i>

      afakhry@chromium.org<span id="user-text" hidden=""><!---->afakhry@chromium.org<!----></span>
      <div id="availability-text" class="availability-notice" title="undefined" hidden=""><!----><!----></div>

    <chops-timestamp title="Tue, Aug 23, 2022, 5:40 PM EDT"></chops-timestamp>
        
          Project Member<span class="role-label">Project Member</span>
      
        <div>
          <a class="comment-link" href="?id=1355752#c7">Comment 7<!----></a>

          
        by
        <mr-user-link></mr-user-link>
        on
        <chops-timestamp title="Tue, Aug 23, 2022, 5:40 PM EDT"></chops-timestamp>
        
          <span class="role-label">Project Member</span>
      
        </div>
        
      <div role="heading" class="comment-header" aria-level="2">
        <div>
          <a class="comment-link" href="?id=1355752#c7">Comment 7<!----></a>

          
        by
        <mr-user-link></mr-user-link>
        on
        <chops-timestamp title="Tue, Aug 23, 2022, 5:40 PM EDT"></chops-timestamp>
        
          <span class="role-label">Project Member</span>
      
        </div>
        
      </div>
    
      
        
        
      
        I don't think this can be repro'ed by a regular user (i.e. without the script you're using). When the capture bar is the target: <span class="line"><!---->I don't think this can be repro'ed by a regular user (i.e. without the script you're using). When the capture bar is the target: <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/capture_mode/capture_mode_session.cc;l=1967-1968?q=CaptureModeSession::OnLocatedEvent&ss=chromium<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/capture_mode/capture_mode_session.cc;l=1967-1968?q=CaptureModeSession::OnLocatedEvent&amp;ss=chromium"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/capture_mode/capture_mode_session.cc;l=1967-1968?q=CaptureModeSession::OnLocatedEvent&amp;ss=chromium<!----></a> we early exit, and don't even attempt to select a window to capture.<span class="line"><!----> we early exit, and don't even attempt to select a window to capture.<!----></span><br><br>However, I will add some code to ignore the capture bar widget from being selectable.<span class="line"><!---->However, I will add some code to ignore the capture bar widget from being selectable.<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>
        
          
        <div>
          
        </div>
      <div class="comment-body">
        <mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        </div>
      </div>
